titleStmt.title: English adventures by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Newcomb, for H. Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Roger Boyle, Earl of Orrery. Cf. BM; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
No more published. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
